text: Shanghai Express is a 1932 American romantic drama movie directed by Josef von Sternberg and was based on the 1931 short story by Harry Hervey. It stars Marlene Dietrich, Clive Brook, Anna May Wong, Warner Oland, Lawrence Grant, Eugene Pallette and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for 3 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1932. == References == ==Other websites== * * * Category:1932 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Josef von Sternberg
title: Shanghai Express (movie)
